description: In a visit to the region, Pope Francis called for peace and praised religious tolerance and diversity, though he kept silent on Azerbaijan’s record on civil and human rights.
title: Pope Francis Visits the Caucasus
title_page: Pope Francis Visits the Caucasus - Video - NYTimes.com
text: In a visit to the region, Pope Francis called for peace and praised religious tolerance and diversity, though he kept silent on Azerbaijan’s record on civil and human rights.
